mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parttime_job (title, location, pay, start_date, end_date, user_id, memo, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{location}, #{pay}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{userId}, #{memo}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT pj.job_id, pj.user_id, pj.title, pj.location, pj.pay, pj.start_date, pj.end_date, pj.memo, pj.created_at, u.nickname FROM parttime_job pj LEFT JOIN users u ON pj.user_id = u.user_id WHERE pj.job_id = #{jobId}

SELECT pj.job_id, pj.user_id, pj.title, pj.location, pj.pay, pj.start_date, pj.end_date, pj.memo, pj.created_at, u.nickname FROM parttime_job pj LEFT JOIN users u ON pj.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY pj.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE parttime_job SET title = #{title}, location = #{location}, pay = #{pay}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, memo = #{memo} WHERE job_id = #{jobId}
